fr.ign.cogit.cartagen.spatialanalysis.clustering

Class BufferClustering

  • Object
    • BufferClustering

  • public class BufferClustering
extends Object
    Make clusters by buffering the features and looking for the overlaps between buffers.
    Author:
    GTouya

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BufferClustering(Collection<? extends IGeneObj> features, double bufferSize) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IPolygon computeGeometry(Set<IGeneObj> cluster)
      Computes the convex hull of the cluster.
      Map<Set<IGeneObj>,IPolygon> getClusters()
      Compute a simple buffer clustering: buffers are merged, then separated into simple geometries.
      IFeatureCollection<IGeneObj> getFeatures() 
      Set<Set<IGeneObj>> getNetworkClusters()
      Same as getClusters() but network intersections are removed from the merged geometry to avoid that two features are clustered simply because they are connected.
      boolean isDebug() 
      boolean isEliminated() 
      void setDebug(boolean isDebug) 
      void setEliminated(boolean eliminated)

      • isEliminated

        public boolean isEliminated()

      • getClusters

        public Map<Set<IGeneObj>,IPolygon> getClusters()
        Compute a simple buffer clustering: buffers are merged, then separated into simple geometries. The features contained in a simple geometry form a cluster. Be careful, this is a memory greedy method.
        Returns:

      • getNetworkClusters

        public Set<Set<IGeneObj>> getNetworkClusters()
        Same as getClusters() but network intersections are removed from the merged geometry to avoid that two features are clustered simply because they are connected. Be careful, this is a memory greedy method.
        Returns:

      • computeGeometry

        public IPolygon computeGeometry(Set<IGeneObj> cluster)
        Computes the convex hull of the cluster.
        Parameters:
        cluster -
        Returns:
